DataListSpec.Name: Child Data For Photo API Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Gets child data for given child.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_GETCHILDDATA_PHOTOAPI( @CHILDLOOKUPID nvarchar(100) ) as set nocount on;
select sc.[NAME] as CHILDNAME, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDID, sl.LOOKUPID as LOCATIONID, sl.[NAME] as LOCATIONNAME from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD sc join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so ON so.ID = sc.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION sl ON sl.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID where so.LOOKUPID = @CHILDLOOKUPID
